sentences.en: A hacker had managed to get into the system.
sentences.cn: 一个黑客设法侵入了系统。

sentences.en: As with progress of technology, measures of hacker's attack also renew continuously.
sentences.cn: 随着技术的进步, 黑客的攻击手段也在不断更新.

sentences.en: Attack Detection able to detect and block hacker attacks.
sentences.cn: AttackDetection可侦测及阻止黑客攻击你的电脑.

sentences.en: China rejects as nonsense that it a hacker haven.
sentences.cn: 中国对它是黑客天堂的说法嗤之以鼻.

sentences.en: I also am not hacker ace, want to steal the family's thing.
sentences.cn: 我也不是黑客高手, 想偷人家的东西.

sentences.en: Its products cover anti - virus , network security and hacker protection.
sentences.cn: 其产品覆盖 反病毒, 网络安全和黑客防卫.

sentences.en: Julian Assange , an Australian former hacker , founded the service in 2007.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的前黑客朱利安阿桑奇在2007成立了“维基泄密”.

sentences.en: Knowledge is power, thieves learned to become a computer hacker!
sentences.cn: 知识就是力量, 小偷学会了电脑变成了黑客!

sentences.en: Our website is temporarily down due to hacker attack, will resume later.
sentences.cn: 本公司网站因遭黑客入侵破坏, 将在短期内恢复运作.

sentences.en: Program design, network technology, hacker attack and defense, and other e - books .
sentences.cn: 程序设计 、 网络技术 、 黑客攻防等各种 电子书.

sentences.en: Sometimes it literally is software, like Hacker News and our application system.
sentences.cn: 有时,它确实就是软件, 比如HackerNews和我们的风险投资申请系统.

sentences.en: The key is protected and cannot be obtained by a hacker.
sentences.cn: 这个密钥受到保护,“黑客”是得不到的.

sentences.en: This hacker designed a computer virus that was hard to manage.
sentences.cn: 这个电脑黑客设计了一种难以对付的病毒.

sentences.en: This site was attacked by a hacker last week.
sentences.cn: 上周这个网站被黑客攻击了.

sentences.en: Wanna be a hacker and hack Google? Go to Lanxiang!
sentences.cn: 一则留言说,想成为黑客、黑掉谷歌?

sentences.en: Xiaowang has set up an anti - hacker device before starting the program.
sentences.cn: 小王在程序启动前就已经预设了 反 黑客装置.

trans.tran_en: someone who secretly uses or changes the information in other people’s computer systems
